QuestData.Title: A Deserter
QuestData.Description: Unit S... Unit S.... hmmmpph.... don't make any sense... it oughta be named after a town...$B$BDarkshire was sent to Dragonblight. The Goldshire boys were sent to the Fjord. Where did I hear...$B$BOh, yes... the deserter! There's a turn-tail in the barracks prison. Got thrown in not too long ago. Kept saying that "S" stood for suicide.$B$BLook for the deserter. He might have some information for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the prison inside Inner Hold in Valiance Keep and speak to the deserter.
QuestData.RewardText: Whad'ya want? I have enough problems as it is!
